author: retke (El Laggron)
description:

install_msg:
Thank you for installing the say cog. Please check the wiki for all informations about the cog.
https://laggrons-dumb-cogs.readthedocs.io/say.html

Type `[p]help Say` for a quick overview of the commands.
short: Speak as the bot through multiple options.
